trans-unit.source: Stores <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.InputLanguage" /> objects.
trans-unit.target: Armazena objetos <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.InputLanguage" />.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.InputLanguageCollection> class is used by <xref:System.Windows.Forms.InputLanguage> to provide a list of the input languages installed on the system.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Forms.InputLanguageCollection> classe é usada por <xref:System.Windows.Forms.InputLanguage> para fornecer uma lista dos idiomas de entrada instalados no sistema.

trans-unit.source: You cannot directly create an instance of this class.
trans-unit.target: Você não pode criar diretamente uma instância dessa classe.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.InputLanguage" /> to locate.
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.InputLanguage" /> a ser localizado.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.InputLanguageCollection" /> contains the specified <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.InputLanguage" />.
trans-unit.target: Obtém um valor que indica se a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.InputLanguageCollection" /> contém o <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.InputLanguage" /> especificado.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.InputLanguage" /> is contained in the collection; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> se o item <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.InputLanguage" /> estiver contido na coleção; caso contrário, <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: The one-dimensional array that is the destination of the values copied from <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.InputLanguageCollection" />.
trans-unit.target: A matriz unidimensional que é o destino dos valores copiados de <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.InputLanguageCollection" />.

trans-unit.source: The index in <c>array</c> where copying begins.
trans-unit.target: O índice na <c>matriz</c> em que a cópia começa.

trans-unit.source: Copies the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.InputLanguageCollection" /> values to a one-dimensional <see cref="T:System.Array" /> at the specified index.
trans-unit.target: Copia os valores <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.InputLanguageCollection" /> para uma <see cref="T:System.Array" /> unidimensional no índice especificado.

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="array" /> specifies a multidimensional array.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="array" /> especifica uma matriz multidimensional.

trans-unit.source: -or-
trans-unit.target: - ou -

trans-unit.source: The number of elements in the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.InputLanguageCollection" /> is greater than the available space between the <paramref name="index" /> and the end of <paramref name="array" />.
trans-unit.target: O número de elementos na <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.InputLanguageCollection" /> é maior que o espaço disponível entre o <paramref name="index" /> e o final da <paramref name="array" />.

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="array" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="array" /> é <see langword="null" />.

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="index" /> is less than the lower bound of <paramref name="array" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="index" /> é menor que o limite inferior de <paramref name="array" />.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.InputLanguage" /> to locate.
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.InputLanguage" /> a ser localizado.

trans-unit.source: Returns the index of an <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.InputLanguage" /> in the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.InputLanguageCollection" />.
trans-unit.target: Retorna o índice de um <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.InputLanguage" /> no <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.InputLanguageCollection" />.

trans-unit.source: The index of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.InputLanguage" /> in the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.InputLanguageCollection" />, if found; otherwise, -1.
trans-unit.target: O índice do <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.InputLanguage" /> na <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.InputLanguageCollection" />, se encontrado; caso contrário, -1.

trans-unit.source: The zero-based index of the entry to locate in the collection.
trans-unit.target: O índice baseado em zero da entrada a ser localizado na coleção.

trans-unit.source: Gets the entry at the specified index of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.InputLanguageCollection" />.
trans-unit.target: Obtém a entrada no índice especificado do <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.InputLanguageCollection" />.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.InputLanguage" /> at the specified index of the collection.
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.InputLanguage" /> no índice especificado da coleção.

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="index" /> is outside the valid range of indexes for the collection.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="index" /> está fora do intervalo válido de índices para a coleção.
